name: Dire Claw
desc: Has a 50% chance to cause the target to either fall asleep, become poisoned, or become paralyzed.
shortDesc: 50% chance to sleep, poison, or paralyze target.

flavorText.sv: The user lashes out at the target with ruinous claws, aiming to land a critical hit. This may also leave the target poisoned, paralyzed, or asleep.
